price: 42. Биз бу дунёда ҳам уларга лаънатни эргаштирдик. Қиёмат Кунида ҳам улар (Бизнинг раҳматимиздан) йироқ қилингувчи кимсалардандирлар.
arabic: وَأَتۡبَعۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي هَٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا لَعۡنَةٗۖ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ هُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمَقۡبُوحِينَ

version.title: Uzbek translation - Alauddin Mansour
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Alauddin Mansour, printed in 1430 H. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-atbaʿnāhum fī hādhihi al-dun'yā laʿnatan wayawma al-qiyāmati hum mina al-maqbūḥīna
translations: And We caused to follow them
